properties.name: common-authorization.allow-customer-token
properties.description: Whether to allow customer tokens (vs only internal/service tokens). Default: false

properties.name: common-authorization.authorization-excluded-path-patterns
properties.description: URL path patterns for which authorization should be skipped. pathPattern: Ant-style pattern methods: empty means all HTTP methods

properties.name: common-authorization.authorization-header-propagation-included-host-patterns
properties.description: URL hosts for which REST client Authorization header should be set (Ant-style patterns).

properties.name: common-authorization.authorization-service-url
properties.description: URL of the authorization service for centralized authorization checks.

properties.name: common-authorization.jwt-public-key
properties.description: JWT public key (PEM format) for RSA/EC signature validation. Recommended for multi-service environments.

properties.name: common-authorization.jwt-secret
properties.description: JWT secret for HMAC signature validation. Used when asymmetric keys are not configured.

properties.name: common-authorization.on-demand-authorization
properties.description: Specifies if authorization is on-demand (only if request contains principal header), or mandatory (request must contain principal header). Default: true (on-demand)

properties.name: common-authorization.principal-header
properties.description: Request header that should be used for getting principal. Default: "Authorization"

properties.name: common-authorization.role-prefix
properties.description: Prefix to add to roles when creating Spring Security authorities. Default: "ROLE_"
